put.description:
Use this endpoint to close the Ground shipments and generate the reports.
Note: FedEx APIs do not support Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) mechanism.

errors.message: Access token expired. Please modify your request and try again.
We could not authorize your credentials. Please check your permissions and try again.
The resource you requested is no longer available. Please modify your request and try again.
We encountered an unexpected error and are working to resolve the issue. We apologize for any inconvenience. Please check back at a later time.

Indicates the description of API error alert message.
Example: The service is currently unavailable and we are working to resolve the issue. We apologize for any inconvenience. Please check back at a later time.

parameters.name: x-customer-transaction-id
parameters.description: This element allows you to assign a unique identifier to your transaction. This element is also returned in the reply and helps you match the request to the reply.

parameters.name: content-type
parameters.description: This is used to indicate the media type of the resource. The media type is a string sent along with the file indicating format of the file.

parameters.name: x-locale
parameters.description: This indicates the combination of language code and country code. Click here to see Locales

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: This indicates the authorization token for the input request.

x-code-samples.source:
<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('https://apis-sandbox.fedex.com/ship/v1/endofday/');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_PUT);

$request->setHeaders(array(
  'Authorization' => 'Bearer ',
  'X-locale' => 'en_US',
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json'
));

$request->setBody(input); // 'input' refers to JSON Payload

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

import requests

url = "https://apis-sandbox.fedex.com/ship/v1/endofday/"

payload = input # 'input' refers to JSON Payload
headers = {
    'Content-Type': "application/json",
    'X-locale': "en_US",
    'Authorization': "Bearer "
    }

response = requests.put(url, data=payload, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

post.description:
Use this endpoint to reprint the closed Ground shipments reports.
Note: FedEx APIs do not support Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) mechanism.

errors.message: Access token expired. Please modify your request and try again.

The resource you requested is no longer available. Please modify your request and try again.
We encountered an unexpected error and are working to resolve the issue. We apologize for any inconvenience. Please check back at a later time.
The service is currently unavailable and we are working to resolve the issue. We apologize for any inconvenience. Please check back at a later time.

parameters.name: authorization

transactionId.description:
The transaction ID is a special set of numbers that defines each transaction.
Example: 624deea6-b709-470c-8c39-4b5511281492

closeDocuments.description: The actual document contents for all provided reports.

code.description:
Specifies the api alert code.
Example: SHIP.RECIPIENT.POSTALCITY.MISMATCH

message.description:
Specifies the api alert message.
Example: Recipient Postal-City Mismatch.

shippingCycle.description: Identifies the shipping cycle covered by the content of this document.

accessReference.description: The name under which a STORED or DEFFERED document is written.

resolution.description: Specifies the image resolution in dpi(Dots per inch)

copiesToPrint.description: Can be zero for documents whose dispositions no content is included.

documentPartSequenceNumber.description: The one-origin position of this part within a document.

image.description: Graphic or printer commands for this image.

ShippingDocumentPart.description: One or more document parts which makeup a single logical document

transactionId.description:
The transaction ID is a special set of numbers that defines each transaction.
Example: 624deea6-b709-470c-8c39-4b5511281492

message.description:
Indicates the description of API error alert message.
Example: We are unable to process this request. Please try again later or contact FedEx Customer Service.

CXSError.description: Indicates error alert when suspicious files, potential exploits and viruses found while scanning files , directories and user accounts. This includes code, message and parameter

value.description: Identifies the error option to be applied.

key.description: Indicates the value associated with the key.

Parameter.description: List of parameters which indicates the properties of the alert message.

closeReqType.description: Specify the close request type to initiate processing of shipment data.For ground close the closeReqType is GCDR and for Reprint EndofDay the applicable value is RGCDR.

groundServiceCategory.description: This is to specify FedEx ground category for which the shipment to be submitted for end of the day closing.

trackingNumber.description:
Specify the tracking number for reprinting the report.It is only applicable for reprint EndofDay and its not applicable for ground EndofDay close endpoint.
Example: 7XX96XX42946

reprintOption.description: Specify the reprint option to generate report. Either by close date or a tracking number.It is only applicable for reprint EndofDay and its not applicable for ground EndofDay close endpoint.

AccountNumber_2.description:
This is the FedEx Account number.
Example: XXX456XXX

value.description:
Conditional.
The account number value. Max Length is 9.
Example: 123456789

CloseAccountNumber.description: The account number for closing the  shipment.

closeDocumentTypes.description:
Indicated the type of close documents requested by the caller.
Example: OP_950

CloseDocumentSpecification.description: Specifies characteristics of the document to be returned for this request.

closeReqType.description: Specify the close request type to initiate processing of shipment data.For ground close the closeReqType is GCDR and for Reprint EndofDay the applicable value is RGCDR.

groundServiceCategory.description: This is to specify FedEx ground category for which the shipment to be submitted for end of the day closing.

trackingNumber.description:
Specify the tracking number for reprinting the report.It is only applicable for reprint EndofDay and its not applicable for ground EndofDay close endpoint.
Example: 7XX96XX42946

reprintOption.description: Specify the reprint option to generate report. Either by close date or a tracking number.It is only applicable for reprint EndofDay and its not applicable for ground EndofDay close endpoint.

value.description: The numeric quantity of this measurement.

Op950Detail_format_topOfPageOffset.description: Specifies how far down the page to move the begining of the image; allows for printing on letterhead and pre printed stock.

imageType.description: Specify the image format used for a shipping document.

stockType.description: Specifies the label stock type.  Lists the correct type of paper for the Freight address label option.Specify valid value PAPER_4_PER_PAGE_PORTRAIT

locale.description:
this is the language and language locale code for the email
Example: en_US, fr_CA, es_MX
